title: FPS Dropping like crazy even at low setting
body: After the patch 7.12 hit, I begin having dropping fps issue, but it not frequently, it's like once every few hour, but then 7.14 come, the FPS drop from 250-200 down to 77-55 in teamfight, and yes, I already do everything on the ticket support said and including reinstall the window, clean the dust, but still not solving the problem, it's never happen before , so if someone, please helping me out, cause I am really frustration right now. And my graphic card is GTX 960 Windforce, so someone, help me, Please.

replies.body: i have the same problem my fps was 120 after patch 7.12 its drop to 50 and in teamfights to 30 i start the game with 120 fps but its down when i move to lane  {{champion:78}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Teamfights can lower your fps a bit due to how much is going on at the same time, but it probably shouldn't be dropping that much. You might need to update your graphics drivers if it's been awhile, so double check for that and follow the rest of the steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to cover the rest of your bases.
i did everything on the support ticket told me to including reinstall the driver, but it still happen, the FPS still drop even at very low setting.
